definition: to adjust/to regulate/to harmonize/to reconcile (accountancy etc)
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: The paper studies dynamic characteristic for industrial steam turbine digital electro hydraulic governing system.
sentences.chinese: 研究了工業汽輪機數字電液調節系統的動態特性。

sentences.english: Thy Lord knows best, and He has the clouds and the sun at His disposal. --Selected.
sentences.chinese: 你的主無所不知，雲和太陽，都受他的使喚與調節。

sentences.english: Test, tweak, rinse and repeat until you succeed.
sentences.chinese: 在你成功之前，測試，調節，清理和重做。

sentences.english: The vehicle′s level can also be adjusted manually in two stages by pushbutton.
sentences.chinese: 汽車的水平高度也可通過按鈕分兩次手動調節。

sentences.english: This thesis presents the new technology in the axial-flow fan blade continous adjustment.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了國內外軸流風機葉片調節新技術。

sentences.english: Globalization will not self-regulate in ways that ensure fair distribution of benefits.
sentences.chinese: 全球化不會自我調節，確保公平分配利益。

sentences.english: The knurled knob (GG) at the bottom end of the depth adjustment rod can be used to make minor adjustments.
sentences.chinese: 用深度調節杆底端的滾花柱頭可以做細小調整。

sentences.english: In this context, the internet can serve as a great equalizer.
sentences.chinese: 在這種情況下，互聯網可發揮調節器的作用。

sentences.english: This product has the lipid, promoted whitening, reduce weight of the health care function.
sentences.chinese: 本品具有調節血脂，去斑美白，減肥的保健作用。

sentences.english: The flexible dolly bar can effectively adjust the film space, and perform the accurate orientation.
sentences.chinese: 靈活的調節杆，能快速有效地調整膜距，正確定位。

sentences.english: Anesthetics alter thermoregulatory responses in all patients.
sentences.chinese: 麻醉改變病人的體溫調節反應。

sentences.english: The ratio of foam concentrate is accurate because of the balance valve's dynamic adjusting.
sentences.chinese: 壓力平衡閥的動態調節保證了較爲精確的混合比。

sentences.english: To be effective, the seat-belt should be fastened tight and low.
sentences.chinese: 根據您的需要，調節安全帶的鬆緊。

sentences.english: Conclusion Deep-sea fish oil has the function of moderating blood lipid.
sentences.chinese: 結論深海魚油具有調節血脂作用。

sentences.english: At present it mainly contains anti-inflammatory and immune regulation in the treatment of UC.
sentences.chinese: 目前UC的治療以抗炎和調節免疫反應爲主。

sentences.english: Discusses the influence on valve authority of different hydraulic balance methods.
sentences.chinese: 本文還討論了不同水力平衡措施對調節閥權度的影響。

definition: to ease (tension)/to alleviate/to moderate/to allay/to make more mild
to bring relief/to alleviate (a crisis)/to dull (a pain)
to adapt (to an environment etc)/to make sth suitable/adaptation/adjustment/adaptive
